scripts.migrate:production: cross-env NODE_ENV=production drizzle-kit generate:pg --config drizzle.config.ts && cross-env NODE_ENV=production node -r esbuild-register server/db/migrate.ts
scripts.migrate:development: cross-env NODE_ENV=development drizzle-kit generate:pg --config drizzle.config.ts && cross-env NODE_ENV=development node -r esbuild-register server/db/migrate.ts
